name: The Lich's Citadel
description:
Hey! A very very early demo for my android game that I'm working on. It's only the first level and has a lot of improvement obviously, but if you could spare some time (30 seconds) and play it I'd be really grateful for any comments and criticisms!

To beat the level, avoid the angry ghosts and find the stairs!

Art:

https://www.patreon.com/ansimuz

Music and Sounds:

Alexander Ehlers

meroleroman7
